description: Aggregated read/write suffer of NBS disks
name: [PROD][MYT] NBS Disks Suffer

expression.program:
let read_suffer = {project='nbs', cluster='yandexcloud_prod_myt', service='service',  sensor='ReadSuffer', host='cluster', type='-'};
let write_suffer = {project='nbs', cluster='yandexcloud_prod_myt', service='service',  sensor='WriteSuffer', host='cluster', type='-'};
